channel.title: Amulius 667 | Economy Based
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i59.tinypic.com/x5dqxh.png[/img][/CENTER] [center][url=http://amuliuspvp.co.uk][size=18pt]Amulius 667 | WEBSITE[/size][/url] [url=http://amuliuspvp.co.uk/play][size=18pt]Amulius 667 | PLAY[/size][/url][/center] [CENTER][IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/rgy15t.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
Welcome to Amulius 667, we created this server in 07/05/2015 and we managed to hit around 20 players! This is an absolutely great achievement for the server & staff who have incredible experience in RSPS.
By now you are probably thinking why you should play on this server. Well, Amulius 667 will offer you some quality gaming experience! We have many creative activities in the server & our developers are awesome and will absolutely deliver awesome updates and joy to the players. I would first like to thank from the bottom of my hearts to all the people supporting this server! which are the players themselves and the amazing people who are able to donate and keep the server alive and running! We appreciate them very much, we wouldn't be here without them, so I would like to thank them very much, from me and the high staff team!
We also have our own community forums which you can check out here: [url=http://amuliuspvp.co.uk/community/]Sign In - Amulius 667 | Community[/url] This forum helps us to improve the server alot due to the fact that the players themselves get to give suggestions & feedback.
[CENTER][IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/rgy15t.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[u][b]EXP_RATES[/b][/u] Combat Skills: x40 Non-Combat Skills: x23
Bronze Member: Combat Skills: x41 Non-Combat Skills: x24
Silver Member: Combat Skills: x42 Non-Combat Skills: x25
Gold Member: Combat Skills: x43 Non-Combat Skills: x26]
[b]Skills[/b] Combat Skills
1.Attack 2.Strength 3.Defence 4.Ranged 5.Prayer 6.Magic 7.Hitpoints 8.Summoning
Non-Combat Skils
1.Runecrafting 2.Construction 3.Dungeoneering [Not fully working yet] 4.Herblore 5.Agility 6.Slayer 7.Hunter 8.Mining 9.Smithing 10.Fishing 11.Cooking 12.Firemaking 13.Woodcutting 14.Crafting 15.Thieving 16.Farming 17.Fletching
[u][b]Minigames[/b][/u] - Barrows - Castle Wars - Clan Wars - Duel Arena - Fist of Guthix - Pest Control - Puro Puro - Lava Flow mining - Warrior Guild
[u][b]Disatractions&Diversions[/b][/u] - Treasure Trails - Ancient Effigies - Most of the shortcuts are working - Crystal Key Chest - All shortcuts working - Grandexchange (website + Game sided)
Bosses - Armadyl - King Black Dragon - Kalphite Queen - Giant Mole - Dagannoth Lair - Tormented Demons - All sort of dragons - Glacors - Corporeal Beast - Bandos - Zamorak - Saradomin
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4iJGsSD.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/29gdg6s.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2jy1iu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi60.tinypic.com/2wovi2s.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi60.tinypic.com/2cna8u8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/rw8504.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi58.tinypic.com/sdi9zq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2ypg6sj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/211whhl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/23moco0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/29gdg6s.jpg[/img]

item.title: Amulius 667 | Economy Based
item.dc:creator: @amuliuspvp amuliuspvp
item.description:
@amuliuspvp wrote:

[CENTER]

x5dqxh.png800×200
[/CENTER]
[center][size=18pt]Amulius 667 | WEBSITE[/size]
[size=18pt]Amulius 667 | PLAY[/size][/center]
[CENTER][/CENTER]

Welcome to Amulius 667, we created this server in 07/05/2015 and we managed to hit around 20 players! This is an absolutely great achievement for the server & staff who have incredible experience in RSPS.

By now you are probably thinking why you should play on this server. Well, Amulius 667 will offer you some quality gaming experience! We have many creative activities in the server & our developers are awesome and will absolutely deliver awesome updates and joy to the players.
I would first like to thank from the bottom of my hearts to all the people supporting this server! which are the players themselves and the amazing people who are able to donate and keep the server alive and running! We appreciate them very much, we wouldn’t be here without them, so I would like to thank them very much, from me and the high staff team!

We also have our own community forums which you can check out here: Sign In - Amulius 667 | Community
This forum helps us to improve the server alot due to the fact that the players themselves get to give suggestions & feedback.

[CENTER][/CENTER]

EXP_RATES
Combat Skills: x40
Non-Combat Skills: x23

Bronze Member:
Combat Skills: x41
Non-Combat Skills: x24

Silver Member:

Non-Combat Skills: x25

Gold Member:
